post_content.caption: UN Genocide Report Only 'The Tip Of The Iceberg' | Quotable
post_content.description:
During the presentation of her report, Special Rapporteur Francesca Albanese shuts down a reporter by saying that government leaders do not openly declare their intent to commit genocide and that the scope of statements and actions by Israel, as they relate to Gaza, is encyclopedic.
